en.title: What is Lorem Ipsum?
en.answer: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

en.title: Why do we use it?
en.answer: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

en.title: Where does it come from?
en.answer: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text.

en.title: What is Lorem Ipsum used for?
en.answer: Lorem Ipsum is used for typesetting and printing industry.

zh.title: 什麼是Lorem Ipsum？
zh.answer: Lorem Ipsum只是印刷和排版行業的虛擬文本。

zh.title: 為什麼我們要使用它？
zh.answer: 事實上，當讀者查看其佈局時，頁面上的可讀內容會使讀者分心。

zh.title: 它來自哪裡？
zh.answer: 與普遍觀念相反，Lorem Ipsum不僅僅是隨機文本。

zh.title: Lorem Ipsum有什麼用途？
zh.answer: Lorem Ipsum用於印刷和排版行業。
